task.title: Set Directory Information Privacy Settings
task.shortdesc: Restrict or release your directory information privacy settings in MyPack Portal.

step.cmd: Click on the Personal Information tile.
From the left-hand navigation menu, select 'Privacy Restrictions'.
For each directory field, choose to either restrict or release access:

substep.cmd: Select 'Restrict' to restrict access to a field.
Select 'Clear' to release the restriction for a field.

step.cmd: If you choose a Full Privacy Block:

substep.cmd: Click the Full Privacy Block field.
Select any exceptions you want to grant.

step.cmd: Click the green 'Save' button to save your changes.

taskbody.result: Your directory information privacy settings have been updated according to your preferences.

postreq.note: Selecting a "full privacy" block prevents the university from sharing your information with anyone, including employers, and excludes you from graduation and Dean's List publications.
